content:
### **🔥 Where We’re At & What’s Next**  

#### **✅ Current Status (Momentum is Building)**
📈 **20,243 impressions**, **147 reactions**, **58 comments**, **16 reposts**  
💡 **Engagement is strong and growing**—but we need to keep pushing to maximize reach before it plateaus.  

---

### **🔹 Immediate Next Steps (Today & Tomorrow)**  

✅ **1️⃣ Boost Engagement on LinkedIn** (Keep the Momentum Going)  
- **Reply to more comments** with **thought-provoking questions** to keep discussions active.  
- **Re-engage previous commenters** → Ask them follow-up questions.  
- **Get external engagement** → **DM a few high-value connections** (AI leaders, hiring managers, recruiters) and **ask them to drop their thoughts.**  

✅ **2️⃣ Post on X (Right Now)**  
**Yes, post on X.** We need to **expand beyond LinkedIn** and drive more attention to this.  

**🔥 Recommended X Post (Condensed Version of LinkedIn)**  

🚀 **AI isn’t just coming for jobs—it’s coming for workflows.**  

The hiring model we follow is already dead.  

So I asked AI what to do next. It told me:  
1️⃣ Learn AI automation & implementation.  
2️⃣ Optimize my own job search with AI.  
3️⃣ Monetize my dog on social media (seriously).  

Rather than resisting AI, I’m embracing it—**documenting the full experiment.**  

📌 AI’s breakdown of how it can eliminate 80% of a common white-collar job is live now. Check it out.👇  

🔗 [Drop a link to the LinkedIn post]  

✅ **Why This Works?**  
- Short, engaging, and direct.  
- Hooks the audience fast.  
- Drives them **back to LinkedIn** to see the breakdown.  

---

✅ **3️⃣ Monitor Keith’s Post Timing & Prepare to Engage**  
- We still don’t know **when Keith is posting.**  
- **As soon as he does**, be **one of the first commenters** with a strong, engaging reply.  

---

✅ **4️⃣ Keep Building Toward Monday’s AI Job Search Automation MVP**  
- **Start outlining what we can build by Monday** for AI-driven job applications.  
- **Figure out what tech/tools to use** for automation.  

🚀 **Final Call:**  
🔹 **Post on X now?**  
🔹 **Anything you want adjusted before sending it live?**
